{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$360.2K in 2021-2022** on contracts with CEDROM SNI.

Across 64 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (6%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 87% and the average number of amendments was 1.25. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$-1.0M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.04 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$133.4K. The longest contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.8M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
